            </td>

             <a class="global-nav__item " href="/patient-resources/medical-record-requests" target="">
              Request Medical Records
             </a>
            </td>
           </tr>
           <tr>
            <td>
             <a class="global-nav__item " href="/patient-resources/financial-assistance" target="">
              Financial Assistance
             </a>
            </td>
            <td>
             <a class="global-nav__item " href="/patient-resources/patient-rights" target="">
              Patient Rights
             </a>
            </td>
           </tr>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div aria-controls="sub_nav_5" aria-expanded="false" class="global-nav__item " tabindex="0">
         <a href="/about-us">
          Why Mercy
         </a>
         <span class="expand">
          ❮
         </span>

        The Mercy Health Difference
       </div>
       <div class="small mt5">
        We will always be responsive to the pressing needs of the time. From a community needs point of view, it is through interaction and engagement with the communities we serve that we will be nimble to meet those needs…for it is in giving that we receive.

       <div class="ratio-8x5 bg-cover" style="background-image: url('/-/media/homepage/besthealthcareprimarycarefamilymedicine.ashx')">
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="w-100 w-lg-50 flex-col-center px2 py4">
       <div class="w-100 w-md-66 flex-basis-auto">
        <div class="h2 mt0">
         The care you need. When you need it.
        </div>
        <p class="muted">
         Our doctors and other caregivers offer high-quality, compassionate care across hundreds of specialties with one united purpose: to help our patients be well in mind, body and spirit.
        </p>
        <a class="btn uppercase letter-spacing small ws-normal" href="/health-care-services">
         Our Health Care Specialties
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="flex-wrap">
      <div class="w-100 w-lg-50 l-lg-50 relative">
       <div class="ratio-8x5 bg-cover" style="background-image: url('/-/media/homepage/hospitalscincinnatitoledoohiokentucky.ashx')">
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="w-100 w-lg-50 r-lg-50 relative flex-col-center px2 py4">
       <div class="w-100 w-md-66 flex-basis-auto">
        <div class="h2 mt0">
         Locations to serve you
        </div>
        <p class="muted">
         With nearly 500 locations throughout Ohio and Kentucky, we make it easy to find the care you need, close to where you live, work and play.
        </p>
        <a class="btn uppercase letter-spacing small ws-normal" href="/locations">
         Find a Mercy Health Location
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <footer class="global-footer" id="footer" role="contentinfo">
     <div class="global-footer__notification">
      Have questions about billing, insurance, or something else? Call
      <a href="tel:5139563729">
       (513) 956-3729
      </a>
      or
      <a href="/contact-us">
       click here.
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="container">
      <div class="flex-wrap">
       <div class="col w-100 w-md-33 pb3 mt4">
        <div class="mb2 subheading smaller">
         Your Location
        </div>
        <div aria-controls="location-selection-modal" class="global-footer__location-btn" tabindex="0">
         <div>
          <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon " role="img">
           <use xlink:href="#pin">
           </use>
          </svg>
          <div class="mx3">
           <div class="smaller lh">
            Select
           </div>
           <div class="lh">
            Enter Location
           </div>
          </div>
          <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon location-arrow-right" role="img">
           <use xlink:href="#arrow-right">
           </use>
          </svg>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="hide-md-down">
         <div class="mb2 mt5 subheading smaller">
         </div>
         <div class="social">
          <a class="social__icon" href="https://www.facebook.com/LivingMercyHealth" title="Facebook">
           <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon " role="img">
            <use xlink:href="#facebook">
            </use>
           </svg>
          </a>
          <a class="social__icon" href="https://instagram.com/mercy_health/" title="Instagram">
           <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon " role="img">
            <use xlink:href="#instagram">
            </use>
           </svg>
          </a>

   <div aria-disabled="true" class="search-modal" id="search-modal">
    <button aria-controls="search-modal" aria-label="Close this Search" class="close">
     ✕
    </button>
    <div class="relative z-1 w-100 search-container" data-error-text="We%27re+sorry%2c+there+was+an+error." data-lat="0" data-lng="0" data-no-results-text="%3cb%3eNo+results+found+for+%27%23searchTerm%23%27%3c%2fb%3e" data-placeholder-text="Enter+a+specialty%2c+doctor+name%2c+or+condition" data-searching-text="Searching..." data-view-more-link="%2fsearch-results" data-view-more-text="Show+All+Results" id="search-form">
    </div>
    <div aria-controls="search-modal" class="backdrop">
    </div>
   </div>
   <script>
    if (typeof window.Mercy === 'undefined') {
         window.Mercy = {};
     }
     window.Mercy.location = '';
     window.Mercy.searchCategories = {
         'categories': [
             { 'label': 'All Results', 'value': '' },
             { 'label': 'Conditions', 'value': 'COND' },
             { 'label': 'Doctors', 'value': 'DOC' },
             { 'label': 'Treatments', 'value': 'TREAT' },
             { 'label': 'Clinical Service Lines', 'value': 'CSL' },
             { 'label': 'Locations', 'value': 'LOC' },
             { 'label': 'Events', 'value': 'EVENT' },
             { 'label': 'More', 'value': 'CONTENT' }
         ]
     };
   </script>
   <div aria-disabled="true" class="slide-out-modal" id="location-selection-modal" style="">
    <div class="slide-out-modal__content-wrapper">
     <button aria-controls="location-selection-modal" aria-label="Click to Close" class="close-btn">
      <span>
       ✕
      </span>
     </button>
     <div class="slide-out-modal__content">
      <!-- modal content -->
      <div data-autocomplete-label="My location is" data-back-btn-text="Back" data-description="Enter your city or zip code to receive recommendations for nearby Mercy doctors or health care centers." data-outside-of-range="There are no Mercy Health Facilities within 270 miles of your search location" data-placeholder="Example: Toledo or 43202" data-save-btn-text="Save my location" data-subheader="Why do we ask?" data-tooltip="Mercy uses your location to provide you with relevant content, like doctor suggestions and medical center directions. We will never share this information." data-user-location="Use my current location" data-without-location-msg="Continue without location" id="location-selection">
      </div>
      <!-- /modal content -->
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-controls="location-selection-modal" class="backdrop">
    </div>
   </div>
   <div data-decline-btn-text="No Thanks" data-error-text="Your browser is set to block your location. Please enable the use of your browser location to use this feature." data-message="In order to provide the most accurate provider results, please enter your location." data-placeholder="Enter City, State, or ZIP code" data-save-btn-text="Use this location" id="location-request-modal">
   </div>
   <!-- Set API Endpoints for UI -->
   <script>
    window.API_URL = '//www.mercy.com/api/';
     window.API_VERSION = 'v1';
     window.GoogleMapsJSPath = 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyC20GQi_MY6GDuvYZMG7jDQU-NrjrVQurk&libraries=places';
